entry.title: Update #001: "The Survey" and what's next
entry.content:
The Survey

I'd be extremely grateful if you could answer the survey, I believe the insights gathered from it would not only help me immensely in developing Furball City, but it might also stir up some great nostalgic memories :D
¬†
This is what I said when sharing a survey I made to know what aspects of CP (Club Penguin) were successful and which ones fell short!
The survey did very well and got 44 very interesting answers, I really loved reading those, and still have a few left to read.
The answers are surprisingly pretty varied but some of them were actually recurring ones.
¬†
Interestingly, a Gameplay Survey with different questions was recently posted on the r/ClubPenguin subreddit. It offered a fresh perspective that I found very insightful!
¬†
Anyways.

So what's next for Furball City?

Well, I've been working on and off on concept and ideas that I gathered into a single place.

I primarily use Discord to gather and organize all my ideas! I know it's kinda unusual, lol

Normal ideas are ideas that I think could be neat to have in the game, or QOL features.

Example: "Text at the bottom of the screen that appears for a few seconds when you enter a different area (eg. enters the caf√© -> "Catnip Caf√©")"

or

"Logging in daily gives you coins"

¬†

Whereas nonsense ideas... They speak for themselves.

Example:¬†"Event where literally everyone is in a pizza, donut, whatever costume"

(I'm still wondering how and why I got this idea...)

or

"Banned players have a short animation "on-ban" where they get kidnapped by an eagle (bye bye üëã)"

(Let's just not speak about that one.)

I could add them into special events, for April Fools day, or possibly never‚Äîit's part of the fun!

Sneak Peek

I use Milanote for more "final" concepts, it's very nice for everything related to the project, I can edit it anytime, add reference videos, images, drawings, text, arrow, etc...

Here's a sneak peek of the main location, Furball Plaza:

I hope you enjoyed this blog post, If there's something you're curious about, or if you have questions, let me know in the comments below. :)

Until then, see you later! üêà

entry.content:
I shared one of the base locations on the Discord server, so why not share it here as well!

Moonlit Meadow is a serene and grassy area that comes alive under the glow of the moon where shooting stars can often be seen. Cats can take a walk in the meadow, play games, stargaze and unwind. At the center of the meadow, cats can find a campfire and sit around it to tell nighttime stories.

What do you think? It's my personal favorite. :)
